title: Getting an Account
description: You will need to contact the system administrator to request an account.  At this time, there are no enforced disk or queue limits but this is subject to change.

sections.subtitle: Account request information
sections.description: Account requests are either granted or denied within a week. If approved, you will be sent an email with your username and dummy password. YOU MUST CHANGE THIS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. Please provide the following pieces of information when requesting an account:

sections.subtitle: Logging in
sections.description: In order to login to flux, you must use the SSH protocol.  This is provided by the 'ssh' command on Unix-like systems (including Mac OSX) or by using an SSH-compatible application (e.g. PuTTY on Microsoft Windows). Login in with your flux username and password. Note that this login information is separate from your UWL and CS Department username and password.
